content: I created an OperationDefinition for Observation. -not using the Spreadsheet. How do I get it to build and publish in the http://hl7-fhir.github.io/observation-operations.html ?
Eric there's no way to do that in the build other than through the spreadsheet. Sorry

@Grahame Grieve here is my first attempt at the #10041 tracker and an operation definition. Its kind of rough around the edges but wanted to get something in there for the WG discussion and plan for the connectathon. BTW I can't figure out the Markdown. Why is the block code not escaping <> and "?
